content: this pattern is super simple and fast and can easily be completed in one sitting hence the name one-sitting pup you can use this pattern as a recipe to make just about any breed of dog modifications are provided for two different ear styles and two different snout styles along with instructions for creating brindle coloring these along with creative color changes if you want to get advanced can be combined to make a variety of different dog breeds some options using the snout and ears provided are * lab * golden retriever * setter * labradoodle or golden doodle try boucle yarn * bulldog * mastiff * pug * spaniel * hound * french bulldog or boston terrier using black and white the list goes on and on what kind of dog will you make
